name: My Fellow Hummingbird
description:
It comes every time to my balcony to sip nectar in a cup (tea time).  

This animation is based on a picture I took some months ago, and how It is made :

1) Read the picture file and reduce its resolution by a factor of 4 - then you have the points X and Y ; 
3) Get the points, refine them using a channel and the intensity level, in this case only the blue channel and certain levels of brightness (this is a trial and error process) - to set the best visual effect ;
4) Now to each point assign a block with size related to the level of brightness, and apply a random displacement for each one every frame. 
5) Loop the frames (10 frames).

The original picture is shown in the small window (full resolution, but only the blue channel).

All process was done in Python 3 using Matplolib, Numpy, Pillow and Random libraries.
